item.title: A curious claim about Advertising's effect on Google
item.description: Google, is it worse now? [short form] In a recent Freakanomics episode about the perceived quality degradation of Google Search, Marissa Mayer makes a claim that ads made Google a more enjoyable product to Google users. This claim came as the conclusion of a long running experiment in which some users were shown ads, and those users ended up using Google 3% more. Mayer drew the conclusion that including ads in search generated better results, and therefore made people more likely to use Google.
